description: Explore the Philippinesâ€™ administrative hierarchy from island groups to barangays. Search places by name, validate official codes, and retrieve parent-child relationships for accurate data and workflows. Power location pickers, address validation, and regional insights with reliable coverage.

capabilities.name: get_island_groups
